snippet: Thousands of teachers and university deans were purged after the attempted coup, but the ripple effects to American academics are just starting to emerge....
abstract: Around 80 people who were awarded State Dept-sponsored teaching placements in Turkey under Fulbright Foreign Language Teaching Assistant Program have had their awards canceled in wake of failed coup attempt; other programs sponsored by State Dept have also been affected.
lead_paragraph: Thousands of teachers and university deans were purged after the attempted coup, but the ripple effects to American academics are just starting to emerge.

headline.main: State Department, Citing Security, Suspends Teaching Program in Turkey
headline.print_headline: State Dept. Suspends Teaching Program in Turkey

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Coups D'Etat and Attempted Coups D'Etat
